aboutMe.bio1: Greetings! My name is Eric Díaz and I'm actually a 28-year-old spanish guy.
aboutMe.bio2: I started my superior studies coursing a scientific-tecnologic bachelorship on INS l'Estatut institute of Rubí.
aboutMe.bio3: After that I studied an audiovisual engineering university degree at Tarrasa's UPC.
aboutMe.bio4: Few years ago I decided to get deeper on web developement sector because I saw that I could show my most creative and self-learning side on a highly-demanded sector and also I was starting to become good at it.
aboutMe.hobbies: My two main hobbies are music and padel

tokenForm.label: The Secret Code
tokenForm.step1: Ask me through the contact form
tokenForm.step2: I'll check if your e-mail exists or also if I know you
tokenForm.step3: If so, I'll send you a code on the message's answer
tokenForm.step4: Introduce the code on the below's input
tokenForm.step5: Click on PDF Logo to download my CV
